channel.title: Data Science and Project Management Portfolio on Aaron Tucker
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science and Project Management Portfolio on Aaron Tucker

item.title: Project IV: Little Rock Pipeline
item.description: Negotiated connection contract in Little Rock Worked with Legal to update contracts Worked with Engineering Management to scope parts of project Worked with Local Pipeline Operations and Scheduling Departments Worked with Senior Management on economics - Example of NPV Calculations - NPV calculations to build business case for project

item.title: Project III: Truck Rack Modification
item.description: Analyzed quality data to determine change required for product specification Worked with Project Engineer to scope project on pipeline terminal truck rack Worked with local Senior Pipeline Technician Worked with Management to approve project - Quality Data Analysis - ROI calculations to build business case for project

item.title: Project II: Pipeline Leak Detection
item.description: Coordinated PipeWorks - LeakWarn Project (leak detection) implementation on Magellan Consoles Led software configuration on LeakWarn Worked with SCADA Production team Worked with Senior Sofware Engineer - Pipeline Manager - Worked with team on Site Acceptance Testing for Pipeline Manager

item.title: Project I: Cold End Spray System
item.description: Six Sigma team was assigned to analyze production volumes and losses. The team used brainstorming and pareto style charting to determine where the greatest losses were occuring. - Sample Charts - Team responsible for project with $600,000 payback Facilitated team through completion of statistical and discipline problem solving Advanced statistics were used in finding main effects, correlations, and models

item.title: Contact
item.description: I would love to hear from you. Create your message below and click send. I will receive your message in my email. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
